channel.title: OMFG I AM NO NOOBY I JUST NEED HELP!it involves ice barrage*
channel.description:
ok in my server i have aloooooot going on *tzjad mini game* mod island* and many others* but theres one thing i can't get!!
HOW DO I MAKE ICE BARRAGE ATTACK MORE THEN ONE!!!
i want my ice barrage to hit in the region of 10 x 10 squares.
PLEASE PLEASE HELP!!
Thanks :D ;)![br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2007, 09:15:07 PM[/size][hr]all i really need is hwo to make it attack more then one like on real rs when you click on a middle mon they all get attacked around it.
That's my concern! Thanks!

item.title: OMFG I AM NO NOOBY I JUST NEED HELP!it involves ice barrage*
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

add this in your Ice barrage spell.

attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 5);

Read full topic
